title: Latest updates: Derbyshire Live on Friday 10 March 2017 - BBC News
summary: london vigil being held to clear derby suffragette 's name .
derby city council and intu finalise deal on property swap .
thousands of fake goods seized at airport .
tideswell named one of best places to live in the midlands .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 monday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates for derbyshire and east staffordshire have finished for the day , but we 'll be back at 08:00 tomorrow with all the latest news , sport , travel and weather .

documents.title: football : kightly could return for burton 's first-time hosting nottingham forest
text: burton albion could have .
on-loan burnley winger michael kightly .
back for this weekend 's game with nottingham forest .
he 's missed three of the past four games with a hamstring injury .
fellow brewers attacker lucas akins is also in with a chance of featuring .
this will be the first ever meeting between burton and nottingham forest at the pirelli stadium in any competition .
we have got three brilliant draws against derby , bristol city and sheffield wednesday .
we are are hard to beat and hard to create chances against . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: weather : risk of isolated fog
text: it 'll be cloudy and mainly dry again tonight , clear spells will develop overnight with a risk of isolated fog patches .
lows of 8c ( 46f ) .
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: photos : vigil for derby suffragette
text: earlier on we told you about derby suffragette alice wheeldon who was imprisoned for plotting to murder the prime minister 100 years ago .
well today her great-granddaughter ( far right ) and campaigners held a vigil outside the royal courts of justice , calling for her conviction to be overturned .
pictured above is liz james a campaigner from derby .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: five arrested following suspected drugs seized in heanor
text: five people have been arrested after derbyshire police seized suspected class a drugs from a house in heanor .
officers searched the house on broadway last friday .
a 47-year-old man from the ilkeston area , three women aged 42 , 32 and 28 and a 17-year-old boy , who are all from the heanor area have been arrested on sus of drug offences .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: council and intu finalise deal on property swap
text: it 's taken two-and-half years to complete but two pieces of paper have secured the future of both the becketwell area and the markets .
the city council wanted the old debenhams store on victoria street - intu wanted the the eagle market - the decision has been ongoing since 2014 .
now the redevelopment of duckworth square can go ahead and the eagle market can be run by the massive retail operation whose doorstep it sits on .
the deal 's been made possible by £ 4m from the .
local enterprise partnership d2n2 .
author: Wesley Mallin
Reporter, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: listen : users of the farm tell us how animal caring helps them
text: beckside care farm , in hollington , offers occupational therapy to help people with mental health issues .
hear what users of the farm have to say about it
author: Jonathan Baker
Reporter, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: your photos : beautiful bamford
text: just look at the perfect views in bamford .
thank you to our weather watcher keithb for sending this photo in .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: watch : the wonder of the ladybower reservoir 'plughole '
text: did you know there 's a giant `` plughole '' just off the snake pass in derbyshire ?
in the corner of ladybower reservoir , part of the derwent dam network , there 's a rather large hole that you probably have n't seen if driving past .
it helps to regulate the water levels at the reservoir to make sure they do n't get too high after heavy rain or snow .
here 's all you need to know about how it works .
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: appeal to find missing derby man
text: derbyshire police is appealing for information on the whereabouts of lakhbir kalirai , from sunny hill , who was reported missing at 10:00 yesterday .
the 42-year-old has been described as 6ft 4ins tall , bald and of slim build , with several tattoos .
he drives a vauxhall corsa and has links to leamington spa .
author: BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: derby play away at brighton tonight
text: derby are away at brighton tonight and the rams ' manager knows what he wants from the remainder of the season
author: BBC Derby Sport

documents.title: a38 : repair work complete
text: repair work to the barrier on the a38 is now complete and all lanes northbound between alrewas and a50 are now open .
the highways agency has thanked drivers for their patience .
author: BBC News Travel

documents.title: thousands of fake goods with a retail value of £ 1m seized at airport
text: thousands of fake items have been seized during a crack down on counterfeit goods by border force officers at east midlands airport .
over 8,000 items were confiscated in three days which included make up , fake trainers , electrical items and designer handbags .
border force officers said if genuine , the goods would have an estimated retail value of over £ 1m .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: afternoon weather : chance of light drizzle
text: today will be cloudy with the chance of light , patchy drizzle although it will be mostly dry .
there may be some brightness where the cloud breaks a little .
highs of 11c ( 52f ) .
author: Alexandra Hamilton
BBC weather presenter

documents.title: government fund will be used to redevelop assembly rooms
text: derby city council has been given £ 6m of government money which will be used to secure the start of the redevelopment of derby 's assembly rooms .
the money was included in a £ 63m pot awarded to the local enterprise partnership d2n2 , to be spent across the region including nine projects in derby and derbyshire .
author: Wesley Mallin
Reporter, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: occupational therapy offered through caring for animals
text: a woman from derbyshire who visits a farm has said that being around animals helps her with anxiety issues .
beckside care farm offers occupational therapy for people of all ages .
visitors to the farm have a chance to look after the alpacas , horses and chickens .
currently more than 30 people visit the farm in brailsford to look after the animals .
author: Jonathan Baker
Reporter, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: a38 : reopen but one lane still closed
text: the a38 northound is now open between alrewas and the a50 .
one lane remains closed to enable repair work caused by last night 's collision .
author: BBC News Travel

documents.title: tideswell named one of the best places to live in the midlands
text: good news if you live in tideswell as the derbyshire village has been named one of the 12 best places to live in the midlands .

the annual sunday times best places to live guide recognised tideswell because of the `` high quality of life '' it offers `` combining factors such as positive community spirit , low crime rates and attractive outdoor spaces '' .
author: BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: a38 : one lane should reopen in an hour
text: highways england said they are hoping they can open one lane on the a38 within an hour .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : today 's weather outlook
text: and here 's how it 's looking today
author: Alexandra Hamilton
BBC weather presenter

documents.title: campaigners travel to london to clear derby suffragette 's name
text: a vigil will be held outside the royal courts of justice in london today to mark 100 years since derby suffragette alice wheeldon was imprisoned for plotting to murder the prime minister .
her great-granddaughter will speak at the event calling for her conviction to be overturned after suggestions evidence was fabricated by mi5 .
her family have been fighting for several years to .
clear alice 's name .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: conservatives win derwent by-election
text: the conservatives have gained a seat on derby city council , winning the derwent by-election .
steve willoughby won last night with labour coming second and ukip , who previously held the seat , coming in third .
the result does n't change control of the council with labour maintaining its one seat majority .
author: Sally Swinfen
BBC Radio Derby newsreader

documents.title: travel : a38 northbound closed
text: the a38 northbound is currently closed between alrewas , in staffordshire , and the a50 near derby after a car crashed into a lamp post overnight .
author: BBC News Travel

documents.title: your photos : chesterfield daisies
text: oh what a beautiful morning , thank you to our weather watcher viki the blue for sending in this delightful snap of daisies taken in chesterfield this morning .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live updates
text: welcome along to friday across derbyshire and east staffordshire .
i 'll be with you today with the region 's news , sport , weather and travel .
if you would like to share your or stories , then please get in touch via .
facebook , .

or .
email .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
